subject: The Next Shift in Shopping: ChatGPT and AI-Ready Product Data
description_text:
OpenAI has introduced ChatGPT Shopping, marking the start of true conversational commerce - where shoppers can ask ChatGPT for products and buy them directly in the chat.

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVG0Q9101wbMW1j51f67ZNTGxW8cYYgJ5DX79TN6klYWK5jMY8W7lCGcx6lZ3mgW95zTjr7V6k_SN7FV817fvy-QW3R4kfV2cq_5cW2S2_Gd4lpzx7W6WjwCr9flQ6QW6nDgv65-MdjTW1vlcBp1r6M1tW5hHp5G6-44DMW6cjrJ336nTLQW3T91VQ5FrrW7W8j2dc15bthD5W4_53t11r72bvW4fkHb_1KsjwZW5WkD7g18bff6W5WqZ7N63LB_DM6f2_yH1VZNW8CrR-F4jDfcdW8vYycD3nShpvW1vvH3s4Wx-zxN1RnF2H7d9Q3W6qfHxK8k6xkGW8gj2KH6jxrgwW1CsP1l3kGSklW1dhlT72tl1fxN4LnrzYNzH4_W3b6BV41kj9wCW66xXQS86WJyzW8s4qMJ6zpkzgW8sQ8bc7pN3LcW3hDpY26ySp2DW6RmZ264wW-58W8XPdbZ1CmfvkW59J74X3WWHPdW29jGzb7cf79RW6-v98j3cV_gRW4XTXNz61r5_SW1fXNKR58x2PDW6x57d02wqw4DW2gRvvg2MM62gW8dBRdf5GYZXnf7GpPZg04 )

Hello Atto,

OpenAI has introduced ChatGPT Shopping, marking the start of true conversational commerce - where shoppers can ask ChatGPT for products and buy them directly in the chat.

This changes how product discovery happens. Shoppers describe what they want and ChatGPT recommends matching products from approved merchants, instead of browsing websites or marketplaces.

Why this matters for retailers

Visibility in AI-driven environments depends on data quality. Only merchants with structured, accurate, and enriched product feeds will appear in ChatGPT results or qualify for Instant Checkout.

Important note

ChatGPT Shopping is currently available by invitation in the US. Retailers and brands not on Shopify or Etsy can apply to join the beta by completing OpenAI’s merchant application form.

How Athos Commerce helps

Our Feed Management Solution (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVG0Q9101wbMW1j51f67ZNTGxW8cYYgJ5DX79TN6klYWK3lcq-W7lCdLW6lZ3m8W2bhWZg5WZdfvW4syNJY6P7Zd7W8yHPLy5zdbvtW4R-ht62nM7pCW1f032F449yQmVf_CcT7qTG-nW8-YxpT1-WWN3Vkw36y8xlFK9Vg7NqS2K5fyfN8ZxKJGdydwFW4NrGlC7pw-0cW8C1LMY7tH6yFW5hlBtv4YJ8YmW66K1MX3LsPqTW3Nr5_D85s5C_W5KLGD94DHPxFW3vRhzr7l6zsQW7fFTyL4zRHXxN8yCVZzFp6GxVP40YS1LxP2SW54hVrb6W8m6TW7gwvjW5sCjyGW70wZ-Y6r4dFfW8qvMcD7TcH0qf16j-RM04 )  prepares AI-ready product feeds that meet OpenAI’s newly announced feed specification. Our solution ensures that product content is well-structured and consistently formatted, enabling AI models to extract key information more efficiently - such as price, images, videos, inventory, reviews and more. We also ensure ChatGPT can recognise your products as “shoppable.”

Whether you’re already an Athos Product Discovery customer or exploring how AI and Conversational Commerce will impact your sales, now is the time to prepare your catalog for this new phase of commerce.

Talk to us about AI-Ready Product Feeds →
